item.title: Sondesh
item.description: Bengalis are considered as food-lovers (khadya-rashik).For them any sumptuous bengali meal is always incomplete without a sweet dish. Just like any french meal which would remain incomplete without a bottle of exquisite french wine. I was not a big fan of sweet earlier but when you live with someone for a long period of time, you quickly start to adapt some of your partnerâ€™s habits be it deliberately or inadvertently.
